title: She Is a Quiet Girl, But a Noisy Telepath - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Cute Story   Early Romance   Episodic   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Psychic Powers   Quiet Characters

description: A junior high school boy, Shinjou, and a girl, Satori, are telepaths who can talk to each other without speaking. However, when the two use telepathy…?　The story is a complete comedy that can be read from anywhere at anytime.>
